<title level="1" right="Spell 1" pfs="Standard">[Bless](/Spells.aspx?ID=25)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Enchantment" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=61" />
<trait label="Mental" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=106" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 321 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Traditions**
[Divine](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=2), [Occult](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=3)

<row gap="medium">

<row gap="tiny">
<row>**Cast**</row>
<row><actions string="Two Actions" /></row>
<row>[somatic](/Rules.aspx?ID=283), [verbal](/Rules.aspx?ID=284)</row>
</row>

</row>

<row gap="medium">

**Area** 5-foot emanation

</row>

<row gap="medium">

**Duration** 1 minute
</row>

</column>

---

Blessings from beyond help your companions strike true. You and your allies gain a +1 status bonus to attack rolls while within the emanation. Once per turn, starting the turn after you cast _bless_, you can use a single action, which has the [concentrate](/Traits.aspx?ID=32) trait, to increase the emanation's radius by 5 feet. _Bless_ can [counteract](/Rules.aspx?ID=371) [_bane_](/Spells.aspx?ID=18).
